title: Baby girl shot by father in Tulare dies, authorities say
content:
The Tulare County Sheriff's Office said 14-month-old Eva Zamora died on Sunday afternoon after she was shot in the head by her father, 37-year-old Larry Zamora. The girl's mother is still listed in critical condition.
Zamora killed himself after a standoff with Police on Thursday.
Stay with Action News and ABC30.com for more.
